spaceinvaders.command

Class CommandDirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.command.CommandDirector

  • public class CommandDirector
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to convert JSON data into Command.
    See Also:
    CommandBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandDirector(CommandBuilder builder)
      Constrct a director that uses the builder to make commands.

        public CommandDirector(CommandBuilder builder)
        Constrct a director that uses the builder to make commands.

    • Method Detail

      • makeCommand

        public void makeCommand(java.lang.String json)
                 throws JsonSyntaxException,
                        CommandNotFoundException
        Convert the json into a Command.
        Throws:
        JsonSyntaxException - if the specified JSON is invalid.
        CommandNotFoundException - if the command could not be recognized.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if argument is null.

      • getCommand

        public Command getCommand()
        Get the last succesfully built command.
        Returns:
        last command, or null if there was no such command.
